```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: random-generator
  labels:
    app: random-generator
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8spatterns/random-generator:1.0            ![1](assets/1.png)
    name: main
    env:
    - name: LOG_URL                                    ![2](assets/2.png)
      value: http://localhost:9009
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      protocol: TCP
  - image: k8spatterns/random-generator-log-ambassador ![3](assets/3.png)
    name: ambassador
```
